name: 24NXT
description:
24nxt is a Digital Production Agency having young, creative and talented team.
Originally founded in June 2009 and launched in July 2010. We are convinced that we can meet any demand, and be creative in whatever style you envision for your project. Our business is a service based one and so we work very hard to make every customer interaction a meaningful one, work with us, you'll see what we mean.
